insert into tripplan(tripplan_id,tripplan_title,tripplan_theme,tripplan_season,tripplan_peo_type,tripplan_start_day,tripplan_days,tripplan_peo_count,mem_id,tripplan_image,tripplan_del) values('tp'||lpad(tp_seq.nextval, 5, 0), #{tripplan_title}, #{tripplan_theme}, #{tripplan_season}, #{tripplan_peo_type},#{tripplan_start_day},#{tripplan_days},#{tripplan_peo_count},#{mem_id},#{tripplan_image},'N')
select 'tp'||lpad(tp_seq.currval, 5, 0) from dual
mapper.select: select tp.tripplan_title tripplan_title,tp.tripplan_id tripplan_id, tp.tripplan_start_day tripplan_start_day, tp.tripplan_days tripplan_days, tp.tripplan_image tripplan_image, mm.mapmark_sido mapmark_sido, mm.mapmarker_enbmyeondong mapmarker_enbmyeondong, ta.triparea_order triparea_order, (select count(*) from triparea where tripplan_id = tp.tripplan_id) totalmarker_count from tripplan tp, mapmarker mm, triparea ta where tp.mem_id = #{mem_id} and tp.tripplan_del='N' and tp.tripplan_id = ta.tripplan_id and ta.triparea_id= mm.triparea_id and ta.triparea_order = 1 order by tripplan_id desc
mapper.update: update tripplan set tripplan_del = 'Y' where tripplan_id = #{tripplan_id}
mapper.select: select mm.mapmark_sido mapmark_sido, mm.mapmark_sigungu mapmark_sigungu, mm.mapmarker_enbmyeondong mapmarker_enbmyeondong, mm.mapmark_x_coor mapmark_x_coor, mm.mapmark_y_coor mapmark_y_coor, tp.tripplan_id tripplan_id, tp.tripplan_title tripplan_title, tp.tripplan_theme tripplan_theme, tp.tripplan_season tripplan_season, tp.tripplan_peo_type tripplan_peo_type, tp.tripplan_start_day tripplan_start_day, tp.tripplan_days tripplan_days, tp.tripplan_peo_count tripplan_peo_count, tp.mem_id mem_id, tp.tripplan_image tripplan_image, tp.tripplan_del tripplan_del, m.mem_nick mem_nick, e.essay_id essay_id, e.essay_meal_exp essay_meal_exp, e.essay_traffic_exp essay_traffic_exp, e.essay_room_exp essay_room_exp, e.essay_other_exp essay_other_exp from mapmarker mm, triparea ta, tripplan tp, member m, essay e where mm.triparea_id = ta.triparea_id and ta.triparea_order = 1 and ta.tripplan_id = tp.tripplan_id and tp.tripplan_del = 'N' and m.mem_id = tp.mem_id and e.essay_del = 'N' and e.tripplan_id = tp.tripplan_id

select mm.mapmark_sido mapmark_sido, mm.mapmark_sigungu mapmark_sigungu, mm.mapmarker_enbmyeondong mapmarker_enbmyeondong, mm.mapmark_x_coor mapmark_x_coor, mm.mapmark_y_coor mapmark_y_coor, tp.tripplan_id tripplan_id, tp.tripplan_title tripplan_title, tp.tripplan_theme tripplan_theme, tp.tripplan_season tripplan_season, tp.tripplan_peo_type tripplan_peo_type, tp.tripplan_start_day tripplan_start_day, tp.tripplan_days tripplan_days, tp.tripplan_peo_count tripplan_peo_count, tp.mem_id mem_id, tp.tripplan_image tripplan_image, tp.tripplan_del tripplan_del, m.mem_nick mem_nick, e.essay_id essay_id, e.essay_meal_exp essay_meal_exp, e.essay_traffic_exp essay_traffic_exp, e.essay_room_exp essay_room_exp, e.essay_other_exp essay_other_exp from mapmarker mm, triparea ta, tripplan tp, member m, essay e where mm.triparea_id = ta.triparea_id and ta.triparea_order = 1 and ta.tripplan_id = tp.tripplan_id and tp.tripplan_del = 'N' and m.mem_id = tp.mem_id and e.essay_del = 'N' and e.tripplan_id = tp.tripplan_id and mm.mapmark_x_coor = #{mapmark_x_coor} and mm.mapmark_y_coor = #{mapmark_y_coor}
